title: Gilani expresses grief over Agha Siraj Durrani’s demise
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 15 (APP):Chairman Senate Syed Yousaf Raza Gilani on Wednesday expressed deep sorrow and grief over the passing of former Speaker of the Sindh Assembly Agha Siraj Durrani.
In his condolence message, the Chairman said that Agha Siraj Durrani’s demise is a great loss to the fields of politics and public service.
He described the late leader as a dignified parliamentarian and a staunch supporter of democratic values, who played a prominent role in Sindh’s political landscape.
Gilani said Agha Siraj Durrani was among the close associates of Shaheed Mohtarma Benazir Bhutto and actively contributed to implementing the manifesto of the Pakistan Peoples Party (PPP).
He extended heartfelt condolences to the bereaved family and party workers, praying that Allah Almighty grant the departed soul a high rank in His eternal mercy.
